DOC.brief_summary: This study will show whether Tri-Vector method can ensure more extensive visual field and conduct the precise surgery when compared with Mini Mid-Vastus method by conducting 2 types of skin incision approach, Tri-Vector for 36 patients or Mini-Mid Vastus for 36 patients in Vanguard PS artificial knee joint total replacement observational period before and during surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Review on Minimally Invasive Skin Incision in Vanguard PS Artificial Knee Joint System
DOC.criteria: The patients who need artificial knee joint replacement in ordinary medical consultation are selected as the subjects. Patients with infections such as osteomyelitis, or sepsis (Because the affected part is lesioned, excellent surgical results cannot be obtained.)
